description:
The main character, Haruno Sayuri, has just entered Fleurir Confectionery School in Aoyama. After meeting some of her classmates - Mochizuki Ran, Sannomiya Tsubaki, and a boy who gives off a bad first impression, Kouzuki Ryou - she heads for the entrance ceremony. There, three instructors who excel at the confectionery arts - Aoi Mitsuki, Hanafusa Gilbert, and Suzumi Yoshinosuke - introduce themselves. And thus Sayuri begins her training to become a p√¢tissier.
Source: crunchyroll
